quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因"full"（满的）和"bodied"（有身体的）的字面意思，将"full-bodied"误判为描述人"体型丰满的"，而非其常用的"（酒、咖啡等）浓郁的"含义。
quiz_item.sentence: The barista recommended the **full-bodied** coffee, saying it had a rich, robust flavor that coffee lovers would appreciate.

option.definition: 体型丰满的；身体壮实的
充满活力的；精力充沛的
